title: League of fucking Yasuo
body:
Why pick another champion when:
1) 3 HP Yasuo.
2) That has no boots.
3) That has Nunu E chasing him - spell locked, already traveling ready to kill him.
4) Decides to press Q and knocking Nunu up, then mash R.
5) Yasuo blinking 3 Kog Maw R ult screens to ult Nunu.
6) Dealing 4000 damage.
7) While Nunu E still hasn't landed.
8) Nunu dying.
10) Redashing another 3 Kog Maw R ult screens in front of Nunu.
11) And shielding 3000 hp.
12) To survive that 5000 E burst.
13) That Nunu's E that traveled 6 Kog Maw R ult screens.
14) Yasuo surviving, blinking for a total of 6 Kog maw R while safely returning to the fountain.
15) While the whole map has less size than 6 Kog Maw ult.

So why pick another champion when such a hacking champions exist?

____
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
**This is not a serious post nor a rant or QQ**, I'm just hoping a gave you laugh by reading this.

replies.body: I liked your unit of measurement for distance.
Sounds like Nunu didn't build enough AP.  5k damage on snowball is weak.
Not gonna lie, if this was a serious post i was gonna god damn explode.

One of the most toxic champs to the game.

His passive is so OP

very few champs can say their passive saved them 5-20 times in ONE match.  There is literally ZERO CD on it and yet blocks all damage....
This comment was a joke too right?
When there's a Yasuo... I play Karma. :3
Yasuo would need lots of lube to handle that gangbang if it was the League of Fucking Yasuo.
Would 6 kogmaws ults range be next to global?
I thought it was serious, was finna ask for the vid cause i would love to have seen this Lol
I pick champions other than Yasuo because Yasuo isn't a cute loli
